trans-unit.source: A simple, cross-platform, pure Python module for JavaScript-like message boxes.
trans-unit.target: A simple, cross-platform, pure Python module for JavaScript-like message boxes.

trans-unit.source: Derived from Stephen Raymond Ferg's EasyGui http://easygui.sourceforge.net/
trans-unit.target: Derived from Stephen Raymond Ferg's EasyGui http://easygui.sourceforge.net/

trans-unit.source: On Linux Python 2, you need to first install Tkinter by running: sudo apt-get install python-tk
trans-unit.target: On Linux Python 2, you need to first install Tkinter by running: sudo apt-get install python-tk

trans-unit.source: There are four functions in PyMsgBox, which follow JavaScript's message box naming conventions:
trans-unit.target: There are four functions in PyMsgBox, which follow JavaScript's message box naming conventions:
